categories.name: Anesthesia & Reanimation
categories.description: Anesthesia and reanimation involve managing pain and supporting vital functions during surgeries, as well as treating critically ill patients.

categories.name: Biochemistry & Clinical Biochemistry
categories.description: This field explores chemical processes in the human body and applies them for disease diagnosis and treatment development.

categories.name: Chest Diseases
categories.description: Covers conditions like pneumonia, bronchitis, and cardiovascular issues affecting the lungs and chest.

categories.name: Gastroenterology
categories.description: Focuses on diseases of the digestive tract, including the stomach, intestines, liver, pancreas, and bile ducts.

categories.name: Gynecology & Obstetrics
categories.description: Covers women's reproductive health, including disease diagnosis, treatment, and childbirth.

categories.name: Eye Diseases
categories.description: Includes conditions such as cataracts, glaucoma, retinal diseases, and other vision-related disorders.

categories.name: Dermatology
categories.description: Studies skin, hair, and nail disorders like acne, eczema, psoriasis, and skin infections.

categories.name: Medical Research
categories.description: Encompasses scientific efforts to improve diagnostics, develop therapies, and enhance patient care.
